physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Making plans for Blood Bank Program at National Jewish Hospital, Jack Gelt, president Mile High Lodge #1783, Lloyd Kahn, chairman Blood Bank Committee Mile High Lodge, Myron Miller (Mickey) president Lodge 171, David E. Harlem, chairman Blood Bank Committee of the Chest Disease Center, #406 B'nai B'rith 171.''

mods.abstract: Left to right: Jack Gelt, president Mile High Lodge #1783; Lloyd Kahn, chairman Blood Bank Committee Mile High Lodge; Myron Miller (Mickey) president Lodge 171; and David E. Harlem, chairman Blood Bank Committee of the Chest Disease Center pose together while making plans for the Blood Bank Program at National Jewish Hospital.
